channel.title: Goudont V4 prices
channel.description:
So, i made a shop on the server and put a rune scimitar in it, and when i went to click on "value", it didn't say anything. and i can't buy it from the store. but, when i go to price check it, it tells me the price. how do i fix it?? and, when i click on the iron, steel, and mith platelegs, it says "this item costs beacon points.
[IMG]http://i1103.photobucket.com/albums/g477/totalystylin/value_zps8dc6d8a1.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i1103.photobucket.com/albums/g477/totalystylin/PC_zpsc595bbb7.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i1103.photobucket.com/albums/g477/totalystylin/beaconpoints_zps271c9fa0.png[/img]

item.title: Goudont V4 prices
item.dc:creator: @Lordabyssal Lordabyssal
item.description:
@Lordabyssal wrote:

You should check the shopID and make it that ID is not used for another points show.

Read full topic
